root.name: After Burst
root.description: OverviewAfter Burst is an action game developed by Dual Corporation and published by NCS Corporation for the Game Boy platform. After Burst was never released outside of Japan.GameplayEach level of After Burst combines some platforming and puzzle elements with the action. The player controls a robot whose job it is to destroy a special orb on each stage.The stages in After Burst are all contained on one screen. There are 30 total stages.
